# INFO to be entered in the Alfred Terminal settings (Kept here just for reference.) # alfredpreferences://navigateto/features>terminal -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- # DOCS https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/cli/cli/send-text --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
on alfred_script(shellCmd) # LAUNCH WEZTERM IF NEEDED # (Appname is `WezTerm`, processname is `wezterm-gui`) tell application "WezTerm" to activate tell application "System Events" repeat while (name of first application process whose frontmost is true) is not "wezterm-gui" delay 0.05 end repeat end tell delay 0.1 # ensure wezterm-gui is ready
# DETERMINE COMMAND if (text 1 thru 3 of shellCmd) is "cd " then set arg to text 4 thru -1 of shellCmd -- leading space to suppress saving in shell history set shellCmd to " clear && cd " & arg end if
# SEND COMMAND set exportPath to "export PATH=/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin/:$PATH ; " do shell script (exportPath & "echo " & quoted form of shellCmd & " | wezterm cli send-text --no-paste") end alfred_script
